# Old exams

In the table below, you find links to PDFs of old exams. The first semester TECH3 was introduced was Spring 2025. The assessment form was then a 4-hour school exam, and we made three exams: One trial exam that students got to train for the exam (getting familiarized with the format), one ordinary school exam and one retake exam for those who did not pass. 

From the Spring 2026, we have moved over to a 6-hour digital school exam after feedback from the students. 

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| error: false
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(knitr)

# Folder with PDFs
folder <- "oldexams"

# List all pdfs
files <- list.files(folder, pattern = "\\.pdf$", full.names = FALSE)

# Separate problems and solutions
problems <- files[!str_detect(files, "-sol\\.pdf$")]
solutions <- files[str_detect(files, "-sol\\.pdf$")]

# Create a tibble with basename (without -sol)
df <- tibble(
  base = str_remove(problems, "\\.pdf$")
) %>%
  mutate(
    problem_file = paste0(folder, "/", base, ".pdf"),
    solution_file = paste0(folder, "/", base, "-sol.pdf"),
    Name = base,  # you can manually edit this column later
    Problems = sprintf("[PDF](%s)", problem_file),
    Solutions = ifelse(file.exists(solution_file),
                       sprintf("[PDF](%s)", solution_file),
                       "â€”")
  ) 
df <- df %>%
  mutate(
    # Remove TECH3- prefix
    raw = str_remove(Name, "^TECH3-"),

    # Split into parts
    Semester = str_extract(raw, "^[^-]+"),   # e.g. V25
    Type = str_remove(raw, "^[^-]+-"),       # e.g. retake / trialexam / raw value
    Type = ifelse(Type == raw, "", Type),    # If no "-", it's an ordinary exam

    Course = "TECH3"
  ) %>%
  select(Course, Semester, Type, Problems, Solutions)
df <- df %>%
  mutate(
    
    Type = factor(recode(Type,
                  "retake" = "Retake",
                  "trialexam" = "Trial Exam",
                  .default = "Ordinary"),
    levels = c("Trial Exam", "Ordinary", "Retake")))
df$Semester <- str_replace(df$Semester, "V", "Spring 20")
df <- df %>% arrange(Type)
# Show table
kable(df, escape = FALSE)

```
